member.name: T:Senkel.Collections.ISimplexCollection`1
member.summary: Represents a collection that items can only be added to, or removed from so that the collection can only be modified using inputs from the caller.

member.name: M:Senkel.Collections.ISimplexCollection`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds the specified item to the collection.

member.name: M:Senkel.Collections.ISimplexCollection`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from the collection.
member.returns: If an item has been removed.
